abilities.name: Restful Meditation
abilities.description: Can't attack. At the start of your turn, heal this and your hero for 2

abilities.name: Awakened Mind
abilities.description: When you've gained 8 or more life this game, this gains +4/+0 and can attack

body.raw:
# Four of Swords

In peaceful rest, the warrior's strength returns.

*"Rest is not retreat; it is preparation."*
